value.title: GDIT Announces AWS Availability on milCloud 2.0 Contract; Dave Levy Quoted
value.excerpt: General Dynamics Information Technology (GDIT) has announced the availability of Amazon Web Services (AWS) under the milCloud 2.0 contract, GDIT reported on Monday. AWS availability will provide the Department of Defense (DoD) access to an expanded portfolio of secure cloud services.
